text: Deputy Minister Karunarathne Paranawithana requested the public to provide drinking water, dry foods, medicines, bed sheets, and other relief goods to this center.Those goods will be distributed to the victims by the District Secretary through the Divisional Secretaries.A relief good collection center has been set up at the Air Force camp in Ratamalana. Deputy Minister Karunarathne Paranawithana requested the public to provide drinking water, dry foods, medicines, bed sheets, and other relief goods to this center.Those goods will be distributed to the victims by the District Secretary through the Divisional Secretaries.
title: Relief good collection center at SLAF Ratamalana camp
